attributes.action: OUT OF HOURS OPTION NEEDED TO SAVE WILDLIFE (AT WILDLIFE CENTRES)
attributes.additional_details: No urgent care when its a life and death situation. Instead they end up in peoples homes or left on the side of a road. We so desperately want to get the animals the help it needs to Survive and then deeply saddened,lefted helpless when we are told there's no help available. Wildlife in the UK are loved and a great importance to us all. We need to save all the wildlife we can at this time of crisis. Give our wildlife the love and care when they need us the most. SAVE THEM, SAVE US.
attributes.background: Many animals that I myself have experienced suffer greatly due to Leck of urgent care during late evenings and nights. This After hours option is needed to those willing to bring the animals to the centers.

rejection.details:
Wildlife centres and veterinary practices are privately operated, so their opening hours and operations are matter for individual centres and practices, not the Government or House of Commons.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Creating a new Animal Health Service (AHS) for free medical treatment in the UK: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/332097
